name: Space Dash (Litefeather, ilymeiib)
description:
Game Made for the  Kex x Pusia Mini Jam where the theme was One Button Only. So you play the whole game with one SPACE!

Your ship is spinning out of control and you are trapped in a bounce slime cage! And aliens are coming for you.  With nothing else than you dash towards the alien crushing them.

Controls:

Tap Space to Dash.

Hold Space to buy upgrade.

Tap Space to select next upgrade.

Tip: While over max you don't take damage!

Programming : Litefeather

Art: Ilymeiib
